humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that 3 lymph nodes were examined and 3 were positive for metastatic carcinoma (one each in sentinel lymph nodes #1, #2, and #3). This corresponds to N1 based on the AJCC staging system (New Rule 12: N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The N stage for this patient is pN1a. This is based on the pathology report which states that 3 sentinel lymph nodes were examined and 3 were found to be positive for metastatic carcinoma. The substaging information (e.g. extracapsular extension) is not provided in the report, so only the N1 stage can be determined.
